nodes.text: Veknoids, also known as Velkoids, were a species native to the planet Moonus Mandel.
Native to Moonus Mandel, Veknoids were characterized by large eyes, floppy ears, and short fur. They were extremely moralistic and engaged in arranged marriages.
The Veknoids had pointed teeth, prominent stubby horns, and sported long tails.
The famous podracer pilot Teemto Pagalies was a Veknoid. Some Veknoids joined the Jedi Order, such as Jedi Master Zao.
